name: Samsung TV - Status and Scheduling
description: This script monitors and controls the power status of a Samsung TV. It supports scheduling based on specific days and time ranges, with the ability to exclude certain dates

parameters.name: weekDays
parameters.label: Days of the week when the TV should be active Should be provided as a list of strings, where each string represents a day of the week. Example: ["Monday", "Wednesday", "Friday"]

parameters.name: datesToExclude
parameters.label: Dates to exclude from the scheduling Provide the dates as an array of strings in MM/DD/YYYY format. Example: ["03/22/2025", "03/23/2025"] Use ["None"] if you don't want to exclude any dates.

parameters.name: port
parameters.label: The host of the TV device defaults to 1515

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.label: Start time for TV operation (HH:MM format)

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.label: End time for TV operation (HH:MM format)
